Package production.aleatory.SolarPanel

Class SolarPanel

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
production.aleatory.SolarPanel.SolarPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, SolarPanelExternalControlI, SolarPanelMeteoControlI
public class SolarPanel extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent implements SolarPanelExternalControlI, SolarPanelMeteoControlI
The class SolarPanel is a solar panel component.

Always on, not producing if the weather is bad. Size: 0.5m^2.

White-box Invariant

 invariant      currentPowerLevelProduction >= 0.0 && currentPowerLevelProduction <= MAX_POWER_LEVEL_PRODUCTION

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      true        // no more invariant

Created on : 2023-10-15

Author:
Daniel SIMA
